channel.title: vedAnta-mUlAni वेदान्तम्
channel.description: A podcast created using https://github.com/vedavaapi/scala-akka-http-server from the archive item: https://archive.org/details/SriAdiSankaraCharyaBhasyarecordedByVedabhoomi.org, with description: Sri Adi Sankaracharya's Bhasya (commentary) on the Upanishads are some of the most important works in Hindusim and Vedanta. They provide Sri Adi Sankara's interpretation of the scriptural texts from the perspective of Advaita Vedanta..
channel.itunes:subtitle: vedAnta-mUlAni वेदान्तम्
channel.itunes:summary: A podcast created using https://github.com/vedavaapi/scala-akka-http-server from the archive item: https://archive.org/details/SriAdiSankaraCharyaBhasyarecordedByVedabhoomi.org, with description: Sri Adi Sankaracharya's Bhasya (commentary) on the Upanishads are some of the most important works in Hindusim and Vedanta. They provide Sri Adi Sankara's interpretation of the scriptural texts from the perspective of Advaita Vedanta..
channel.itunes:author: Various sanskrit scholars
